texts: {"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Add vehicle(s)"}
Only vehicles constructed, adapted or equipped to provide roadside assistance or recovery services should be added to this discount.
We take fraud and misuse of all discounts very seriously. Our verification of the information supplied may include on-street inspections and checks.
If you stop being the owner of a registered discounted vehicle, or the vehicle is no longer eligible for the discount, you must immediately notify us and remove the vehicle from the discount.
This vehicle does not meet the ULEZ emissions standards. You need to pay the ULEZ charge if you drive within the zone. The zone operates at all times - charging days run from midnight to midnight.
This vehicle does not meet the ULEZ emissions standards. You need to pay the ULEZ charge if you drive within the zone. The zone operates at all times - charging days run from midnight to midnight.
Maximum number of vehicles in this transaction reached.
To add further vehicles, complete this transaction before starting a new one.
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle qualifies for a 100% discount on the Congestion Charge.
If you believe this is incorrect and you still want to pay the Congestion Charge, add this vehicle or apply for a discount, then you can continue with this process.
This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle is exempt from the Congestion Charge.
If you believe this is incorrect and you still want to pay the Congestion Charge, add this vehicle or apply for a discount, then you can continue with this process.
This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
If the number plate is correct but the vehicle description shown is wrong, you can still continue to register this vehicle.
Vehicle information is provided to TfL by the DVLA or DVA, so you'll need to let the DVLA or DVA know if your vehicle details are wrong or need to be updated.
We do not hold details for this vehicle
UK-registered: If your vehicle’s make and model details have not been returned, please make sure you entered the number plate correctly before continuing.
Registered outside the United Kingdom: We are unable to display the make, model and colour information. Confirm your details before continuing.
There is a £10 charge for each vehicle added. This charge should be paid no matter how long it is before the discount expires.
